column5: Peaceful retreat! This 2 bedroom/2 bath rental sleeps 6 and has 2 Kings and 1 Queen. This rental is fully furnished and provides nice amenities like cookware, linens, towels, washer/dryer, TV's, DVD player and more. Relax by the pool or hot tubs. Also enjoy easy river access perfect for swimming, tubing and fishing.
column8: Beautiful Guadalupe River hideaway only 6 blocks from SCHLITTERBAHN! - Waterwheel K-302
